dc:title: Fall Appeal - October 1958
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Begs for help "with this wild adventure of the works of mercy." Protests the state's appropriation of private property and its "ownership of the indigent."
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 745 1958-10-03 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
